Title: Grants concurrent jurisdiction to the city of New York department of health and mental hygiene over grocery stores and farmers markets
Summary: Grants concurrent jurisdiction to the department of agriculture and markets and the city of New York department of health and mental hygiene over grocery stores and farmers' markets.
LawCode: Amd §§556, NYC Chart; amd §16, Ag & Mkts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the New York city charter and the agriculture and markets law, in relation to granting concurrent jurisdiction to the city of New York department of health and mental hygiene to conduct inspections of retail food stores and farmers' markets; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
